column.title: 销售金额(出厂价含税元)

content.sql:
WITH total AS( select convert(varchar(12),org.pi2) AS pid2,org.pn2,sum(box) AS box,sum(box*prod.prod_price) AS money from rpt_data_sale sale inner join mdm_distributor dist on sale.dist_id=dist.dist_id inner join base_org org on dist.org_id=org.org_id inner join mdm_product prod on sale.target_prod_code=prod.prod_code where 1=1 $orgSubCode$ $orgAuth$ $billDate1$ $billDate2$ $distId$ group by org.pi2,org.pn2 )
SELECT 0,total.pid2,total.pn2,'','','','',box,MONEY FROM total UNION ALL SELECT 0,min(total.pid2)+'a',min(total.pn2)+CAST(count(*) AS VARCHAR(12))+'家大区合计','','','','',sum(box),sum(money) FROM total INNER JOIN BASE_ORG org ON total.pid2=org.ORG_ID WHERE org.ORG_ID IN (4,17,42,47,49) GROUP BY substring(org.ORG_CODE,0,4)
union ALL select convert(varchar(12),org.pi2),convert(varchar(12),org.pi3) AS pid3,org.pn2,org.pn3,'','','',sum(box) AS box,sum(box*prod.prod_price) AS money from rpt_data_sale sale inner join mdm_distributor dist on sale.dist_id=dist.dist_id inner join base_org org on dist.org_id=org.org_id inner join mdm_product prod on sale.target_prod_code=prod.prod_code where 1=1 $orgSubCode$ $orgAuth$ $billDate1$ $billDate2$ $distId$ group by org.pi2,org.pi3,org.pn2,org.pn3
UNION ALL select convert(varchar(12),org.pi3),convert(varchar(12),org.pi4),org.pn2,org.pn3, org.PN4,'','',sum(box),sum(box*prod.prod_price) from rpt_data_sale sale inner join mdm_distributor dist on sale.dist_id=dist.dist_id inner join base_org org on dist.org_id=org.org_id inner join mdm_product prod on sale.target_prod_code=prod.prod_code where 1=1 $orgSubCode$ $orgAuth$ $billDate1$ $billDate2$ $distId$ group by org.pi2,org.pi3,org.pn2,org.pn3,org.PN4 ,org.PI4
UNION ALL select convert(varchar(12),org.pi4),convert(varchar(12),dist.DIST_ID),org.pn2,org.pn3, org.PN4, dist.DIST_NAME,'',sum(box),sum(box*prod.prod_price) from rpt_data_sale sale inner join mdm_distributor dist on sale.dist_id=dist.dist_id inner join base_org org on dist.org_id=org.org_id inner join mdm_product prod on sale.target_prod_code=prod.prod_code where 1=1 $orgSubCode$ $orgAuth$ $billDate1$ $billDate2$ $distId$ group by org.pi2,org.pi3,org.pn2,org.pn3,org.PN4 ,org.PI4 ,dist.DIST_ID,dist.DIST_NAME
UNION ALL select convert(varchar(12),dist.DIST_ID),convert(varchar(12),dist.DIST_ID)+'a'+convert(varchar(12),prod.TYPE_ID),org.pn2,org.pn3, org.PN4, dist.DIST_NAME,ptype.ITEM_NAME,sum(box),sum(box*prod.prod_price) from rpt_data_sale sale inner join mdm_distributor dist on sale.dist_id=dist.dist_id inner join base_org org on dist.org_id=org.org_id inner join mdm_product prod on sale.target_prod_code=prod.prod_code inner join base_dict_item ptype on prod.type_id=ptype.dict_item_id where 1=1 $orgSubCode$ $orgAuth$ $billDate1$ $billDate2$ $distId$ group by org.pi2,org.pi3,org.pn2,org.pn3,org.PN4 ,org.PI4 ,dist.DIST_ID,dist.DIST_NAME,prod.TYPE_ID,ptype.ITEM_NAME
